TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConstraintExpressionBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: ConstraintExpressionBase is the abstract base class for the ConstraintExpression class, which represents a compound constraint in the process of being constructed from a series of syntactic elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class NUnit.Framework.Constraints.Constraint Append(class NUnit.Framework.Constraints.Constraint constraint) cil managed

Docs.summary: Appends a constraint to the expression and returns that constraint, which is associated with the current state of the expression being built.
